sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Set sn_kmf.protected_script_encrypter.use.newkey property and ignore cache to true</description>
        <name>Enable AES encrypt for protected script</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.info("Running fix script to update sn_kmf.protected_script_encrypter.use.newkey property record");
var propGr = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
propGr.addQuery('name', 'sn_kmf.protected_script_encrypter.use.newkey');
propGr.query();
if (propGr.next()) {
    var propValue = propGr.getValue('value');
    var ignoreCache = propGr.getValue('ignore_cache');
    if (propValue != 'true' || ignoreCache == '0') {
        propGr.setValue('value', 'true');
        propGr.setValue('ignore_cache', '1');
        propGr.update();
        gs.info("Updated sn_kmf.protected_script_encrypter.use.newkey property record");
    }
}
gs.info("Fix script to update sn_kmf.protected_script_encrypter.use.newkey property record completed");]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-02-05 04:44:43</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>58eb286f40404610f877e8531b1c1eb1</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Enable AES encrypt for protected script</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework" source="sn_kmf">c515f25b53332300cd1eddeeff7b126e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework">c515f25b53332300cd1eddeeff7b126e</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_58eb286f40404610f877e8531b1c1eb1</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-26 12:37:37</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Enable AES encrypt for protected script
